title: Amanda's Descent
description: Amanda is a bored housewife with a taste for adventure. At a friend's suggestion, she "gets her flirt on" for the cable guy. Unbeknownst to Amanda, her husband's best friend witnesses everything... and wastes no time in using the information to his advantage! He takes Amanda on a thrill ride which includes cam sex, an adult bookstore and a biker bar. Things will never be the same...
author: Dylan Cross
